title: Marquee Matchups, Fan Questions, Renee Montgomery ATS Preview | WHAT’S BURNIN’ | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Marquee Matchups, Fan Questions, Renee Montgomery ATS Preview | WHAT’S BURNIN’ | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
WHATS BURNIN' is back! The boys look ahead to a great week of games, including two big matchups for the Blazers vs. the Jazz and Clippers. Plus, they answer fan questions and preview this week's ALL THE SMOKE episode.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
